message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. I think this is a great price considering the value it brings, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $16000. This is a great compromise, considering the value it brings. What do you think?
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but $16000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, and I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer you the product for $15500. This is a very competitive price, considering the value it brings. I'm not willing to go any lower, but I'm confident you'll see the value in this offer. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make another compromise, but $15500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $14500 for the product. I'm getting close to my budget, and I'd like to try to get as close to $10000 as possible. Can you consider this price?
